Package ro.siit.java11.LevelMonitor.service

Class ReadingServiceImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ro.siit.java11.LevelMonitor.service.ReadingServiceImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadingService
    @Service
public class ReadingServiceImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReadingService
    ReadingServiceImplementation class is the business logic layer that handles requests for creating/deleting/editing, etc of Readings.
